question:
Use the following program to answer questions 1 to 3

1. Procedure CSC211_exam(var S: String; m, n:integer);
2.   var c: char
3. begin
4.   if m<n then begin
5.     c:= s[m]; s[m] :=s[n]; s[n] :=c;
6.     csc211_exam(s, m+1, n-1)
7.   end
8. end
